name: Raincouver
description:
Save the girl save the world

Raincouver is tongue in cheek humor game. We all hope Covid doesn't stay around forever, but if it does it might just evolve into a zombie apocalypse right? Well if in the year 2069 its still around maybe we can can finally all wear a mask. Or not, antivaxxers still exist and they kidnapped your girl. if the zombie apocalypse wasn't enough now antivaxxers have your girlfriend? Not only that are they right about conspiracies and everything?....probably not.

Raincouver is a short arcade style story game, its difficult and you only get 3 lives to complete the campaign. if you die 3 times you'll have to start from the beginning, when you start over you get to keep your level progress and any new gear.

Discover new enemies, upgrade weapons, loot like there's no tomorrow. This game is in early access and is a fun fast-paced arcade shooter in first-person. Until release we will update you on how the game is progressing. How the story is coming along. And how the game will be when its finished.

As of now have fun playing with the games mechanics, and killing some zombies. Let us know what you think.

When the game releases there will be more content to loot, characters to interact with, and a fun story with fun fast gameplay and retro wave music.
